projectName: Daily Event Insurance - Partner Integration Support Agent

milestones.name: Phase 1: Database Schema & Infrastructure

tasks.name: Add support_conversations table to lib/db/schema.ts
tasks.description: Create support_conversations table for partner integration help sessions

tasks.name: Add onboarding_recordings table to schema
tasks.description: For screen recording during onboarding

tasks.name: Add integration_docs table to schema
tasks.description: For RAG-powered integration documentation search

tasks.name: Add partner_integrations table to schema
tasks.description: Track integration status for each partner

tasks.name: Set up Supabase Realtime for chat

milestones.focus: Set up database schema for integration support system

milestones.name: Phase 2: AI Integration Agent Core

tasks.name: Create AI integration agent service (lib/support/integration-agent.ts)
tasks.description: OpenAI GPT-4o agent with system prompt for technical integration help

tasks.name: Implement generate_widget_code tool
tasks.description: Generate widget embed code for vanilla JS, React, Vue, Angular

tasks.name: Implement generate_api_snippet tool
tasks.description: Generate API code snippets for JavaScript, Python, PHP, curl

tasks.name: Implement get_pos_integration_guide tool
tasks.description: Return step-by-step guides for Mindbody, Pike13, ClubReady, Mariana Tek, Square

tasks.name: Implement check_integration_status tool
tasks.description: Check if partner's widget/API/webhook is working

tasks.name: Implement search_integration_docs tool
tasks.description: Semantic search over integration documentation

tasks.name: Implement escalate_to_dev_team tool
tasks.description: Create support ticket for dev team with context

milestones.focus: Build the AI agent with integration-focused tools

milestones.name: Phase 3: Chat UI Components

tasks.name: Create IntegrationChatWidget component
tasks.description: Chat widget for partner portal and onboarding flow

tasks.name: Integrate chat into onboarding flow
tasks.description: Add chat widget to /onboarding pages with step context

tasks.name: Integrate chat into partner portal
tasks.description: Add chat widget to /partner/* pages

tasks.name: Add typing indicators and message streaming

milestones.focus: Build chat UI with code snippet support

milestones.name: Phase 4: Screen Recording

tasks.name: Integrate rrweb library
tasks.description: Add rrweb for DOM-based screen recording

tasks.name: Create useOnboardingRecording hook
tasks.description: Hook to start/stop/upload recordings

tasks.name: Build recording upload to Supabase Storage
Add recording opt-in UI to onboarding
tasks.description: Permission dialog and recording indicator

tasks.name: Create recording playback for admin
tasks.description: Admin can replay partner's onboarding session

milestones.focus: Screen recording for guided onboarding help

milestones.name: Phase 5: Integration Documentation & RAG

tasks.name: Create integration docs content (Markdown)
tasks.description: Write docs for widget, API, each POS system, troubleshooting

tasks.name: Build embedding generation service
tasks.description: Generate OpenAI embeddings for doc chunks

tasks.name: Create semantic search API
tasks.description: POST /api/support/docs/search with vector similarity

milestones.focus: Build knowledge base for RAG-powered responses

tasks.name: Build conversation detail view
